name: anki-ai-agent
title: Anki AI Agent
description: Raycast extension to create Anki flashcards through AI chat
author: yuichkun

commands.name: configure-decks
commands.title: Configure Anki Decks
commands.description: Set up deck settings for Anki card creation

tools.name: get-deck-configurations
tools.title: Get Deck Configurations
tools.description: Retrieve all configured Anki decks with their note types, card templates, and format examples. MUST be called before add-card.

tools.name: add-card
tools.title: Add Card to Anki
tools.description: Add a new card to Anki using a configured deck ID. The card will use the deck's pre-configured note type and should follow the deck's template guidelines.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
